chk_dates.name: chk_dates
chk_dates.value: end_date IS NULL OR end_date >= allocation_date

chk_hostel_for_regular_support.name: chk_hostel_for_regular_support
chk_hostel_for_regular_support.value:
(access_level IN ('regular', 'support') AND hostel_id IS NOT NULL)
    OR (access_level = 'super' AND hostel_id IS NULL)
